Vista 15p User Management

Dec 1, 2016

User management

users #03-49

Adding user

master code + 8 + user_no + user_code

Deleting user

master code + 8 + user_no + # + 0

Set User Authority

master code + 8 + user_no + # + 1 + value 0=user 1=arm only 2=guest 3=duress 4=part_master

Set Master code

master code + 8 + user_no + new master code

Set installer code

go into programming mode first:

*20 + new installer code +

Exit installer mode

Programming Expert

enable keypad at address 18 # ad2usb
